verses.verse: The word<WH1697> that came to Jeremiah<WH3414> from Jehovah<WH3068>, saying<WH559>,
Hear <WH8085> ye the words<WH1697> of this covenant<WH1285>, and speak<WH1696> unto the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063>, and to the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>;

and say<WH559> thou unto them<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>: Cursed<WH779> be the man<WH376> that heareth<WH8085> not the words<WH1697> of this covenant<WH1285>,

which I commanded<WH6680> your fathers<WH1> in the day<WH3117> that I brought them forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, out of the iron<WH1270> furnace<WH3564>, saying<WH559>, Obey<WH8085> my voice<WH6963>, and do<WH6213> them<WH6680>, according to all which I command you<WH5971>: so shall ye be my people, and I will be your God<WH430>;

that I may establish<WH6965> the oath<WH7621> which I sware<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1>, to give<WH5414> them a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>, as at this day<WH3117>. Then answered<WH6030> I<WH559>, and said, Amen<WH543>, O Jehovah<WH3068>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me<WH7121>, Proclaim all these words<WH1697> in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063>, and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, saying<WH559>, Hear<WH8085> ye the words<WH1697> of this covenant<WH1285>, and do them<WH6213>.

For I earnestly<WH5749> protested<WH5749> unto your fathers<WH1> in the day<WH3117> that I brought them up<WH5927> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, even unto this day<WH3117>, rising early<WH7925> and protesting<WH5749>, saying<WH559>, Obey<WH8085> my voice<WH6963>.

Yet they obeyed<WH8085> not<WH5186>, nor inclined their ear<WH241>, but walked<WH3212> every one<WH376> in the stubbornness<WH8307> of their evil<WH7451> heart<WH3820>: therefore I brought<WH935> upon them all the words<WH1697> of this covenant<WH1285>, which I commanded<WH6680> them to do<WH6213>, but they did them not<WH6213>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto me<WH7195>, A conspiracy is found<WH4672> among the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063>, and among the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>.

They are turned back<WH7725> to the iniquities<WH5771> of their forefathers<WH7223>, who refused<WH3985> to hear<WH8085> my words<WH1697>; and they are gone<WH1980> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to serve<WH5647> them<WH1004>: the house of Israel<WH3478> and the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> have broken<WH6565> my covenant<WH1285> which I made<WH3772> with their fathers<WH1>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, Behold<WH935>, I will bring evil<WH7451> upon them<WH3201>, which they shall not be able to escape<WH3318>; and they shall cry<WH2199> unto me<WH8085>, but I will not hearken unto them.

Then shall the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> go<WH1980> and cry<WH2199> unto the gods<WH430> unto which they offer incense<WH6999>: but they will not save<WH3467> them at all<WH3467> in the time<WH6256> of their trouble<WH7451>.

For according to the number<WH4557> of thy cities<WH5892> are thy gods<WH430>, O Judah<WH3063>; and according to the number<WH4557> of the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389> have ye set up<WH7760> altars<WH4196> to the shameful thing<WH1322>, even altars<WH4196> to burn incense<WH6999> unto Baal<WH1168>.

Therefore pray<WH6419> not thou for this people<WH5971>, neither lift up<WH5375> cry<WH7440> nor prayer<WH8605> for them<WH8085>; for I will not hear them in the time<WH6256> that they cry<WH7121> unto me because of their trouble<WH7451>.

What hath my beloved<WH3039> to do in my house<WH1004>, seeing she hath wrought<WH6213> lewdness<WH4209> with many<WH7227>, and the holy<WH6944> flesh<WH1320> is passed<WH5674> from thee<WH7451>? when thou doest evil, then thou rejoicest<WH5937>.

Jehovah <WH3068> called<WH7121> thy name<WH8034>, A green<WH7488> olive-tree<WH2132>, fair<WH3303> with goodly<WH8389> fruit<WH6529>: with the noise<WH6963> of a great<WH1419> tumult<WH1999> he hath kindled<WH3341> fire<WH784> upon it<WH1808>, and the branches of it are broken<WH7489>.

For Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, who planted<WH5193> thee<WH1696>, hath pronounced evil<WH7451> against thee<WH1558>, because of the evil<WH7451> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and of the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063>, which they have wrought<WH6213> for themselves in provoking me to anger<WH3707> by offering incense<WH6999> unto Baal<WH1168>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> gave me knowledge<WH3045> of it<WH3045>, and I knew it<WH7200>: then thou showedst me their doings<WH4611>.

But I was like a gentle<WH441> lamb<WH3532> that is led<WH2986> to the slaughter<WH2873>; and I knew<WH3045> not that they had devised<WH2803> devices<WH4284> against me<WH7843>, saying, Let us destroy the tree<WH6086> with the fruit<WH3899> thereof<WH3772>, and let us cut him off from the land<WH776> of the living<WH2416>, that his name<WH8034> may be no more remembered<WH2142>.

But <WH3068>, O Jehovah of hosts<WH6635>, who judgest<WH8199> righteously<WH6664>, who triest<WH974> the heart<WH3629> and the mind<WH3820>, I shall see<WH7200> thy vengeance<WH5360> on them<WH1540>; for unto thee have I revealed my cause<WH7379>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> concerning the men<WH582> of Anathoth<WH6068>, that seek<WH1245> thy life<WH5315>, saying<WH559>, Thou shalt not prophesy<WH5012> in the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068>, that thou die<WH4191> not by our hand<WH3027>;

therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, Behold<WH6485>, I will punish them<WH970>: the young men shall die<WH4191> by the sword<WH2719>; their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> shall die<WH4191> by famine<WH7458>;
and there shall be no remnant<WH7611> unto them<WH935>: for I will bring evil<WH7451> upon the men<WH582> of Anathoth<WH6068>, even the year<WH8141> of their visitation<WH6486>.
